org.opensaml.storage.impl

Class LDAPStorageService

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.shibboleth.utilities.java.support.component.AbstractInitializableComponent
      • net.shibboleth.utilities.java.support.component.AbstractIdentifiedInitializableComponent
        • net.shibboleth.utilities.java.support.component.AbstractIdentifiableInitializableComponent
          • org.opensaml.storage.AbstractStorageService
            • org.opensaml.storage.impl.LDAPStorageService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Component, DestructableComponent, IdentifiableComponent, IdentifiedComponent, InitializableComponent, StorageCapabilities, StorageCapabilitiesEx, StorageService

    public class LDAPStorageService
extends AbstractStorageService
implements StorageCapabilitiesEx
    Implementation of StorageService that stores data in an LDAP. Does not support expiration or versioning at this time.
